name: MicroLeague WWF Super Stars Volume 2
overview: An add-on disk to be used with the WWF Game-Match Disk allowing the player to choose other matches featuring pairs of the the Greatest competitors of the WWF at the time. The Honky Tonk Man, Andre the Giant, Hulk Hogan, Ted DDiBiase, Randy Savage, Bobby "The Brain", One Man Gang, Ravishing Rick Rude, Jake the Snake Roberts, Koko B. Ware, Hacksaw Jim Duggan and others can be matched up and allows you to pick the moves, pump up the drama inside and outside the ring and have Liver interviews with Mean Gene Okerland. Stats plus strategy equals ACTION!
